Posts.Content: Mar 13, 2009 07:28PM TiffanyB wrote: Hi Everyone.  I am new to this site and was looking for some answers.  I'm not sure if I am at the right topic or not, but I'll throw it out there.  I was diagnsed with breast cancer at the age of 31.  I am now 36 and recently went for genetic testing.  I was hoping and praying for a negative test result, but it came back testing positive for the brca 2 gene.  Now I am scared that it is a death sentence.  I have this underlying fear that I passed something on to my 6 year old son.  I meet with a genetic counselor at the end of this month, but if anyone has any type of information they could pass my way, I would be more than grateful.  Thank you in advance....
